Html: I am a tank and I would rather see my base avoidance/health without the factoring in of my on-use trinkets, I was wondering if there was a way to turn this off or if not could it be an option for a future release.  Atm, it makes comparing trinkets extremely difficult.  I noticed this when it said I should have 47k health fully buffed but I never get much more than 46k in raids (I use a trinket that has a use of increasing my health), and on further inspection it was also averaging in an on-use of dodge rating from my other trinket into my overall avoidance.
Yes, there is. Right-Click, Edit, Delete the Special Effect.
